title: Jump on the Sinking Ship
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Super Bowl preview, looking at the coaching carousel and your stories about sending a text to the wrong person!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones touches on the power of the Super Bowl and what winning the biggest trophy in the game would do for Bengals QB Joe Burrow’s career (1:40). Plus, who should have gotten the Texans coaching job (15:02), an IYHH including Rihanna’s pregnancy (30:46), as well as your voicemails from that text you mistakenly sent to the wrong person like Patriots coach Bill Belichick (42:01).


IYHH Stories

  1. @rachel_treisman on Rihanna’s pregnancy, and why the internet is understandably abuzz: https://n.pr/3Ldt1UK
  2. @drewharwell says the IRS has abandoned a facial recognition plan after firestorm of criticism: https://wapo.st/3HCMDPT
  3. @MiaRSato shares that Coachella will sell lifetime festival passes as NFTs: https://bit.ly/3oy7M6h
